27b4(rgyud 'grel): po brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma nir+yA ta na pU dza s+pha ra Na karma badz+ri aHoM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma nir+yA tA na pU dza s+pha ra Ne kar+m+ma gri dzaHoM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma nir+yA tan a nu rA ga Na pU dza s+pha ra Na karma pA Ne hUM hoH
27b5(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga tA sarba At+ma nir+yA ta na sA d+hu ka ra pU dza s+phA ra Na karma tuSh+Ti eHoM na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga ta kA ya a b+hi She ka rat+ne b+h+yo badz+ra ma Ni oM/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA gA ta sur+ye b+h+yo badz+ra te dza ni dz+wa la hrIHoM ni maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga ta A sha pa ri pU ra Na tsin+da ma Ni d+hA
27b6(rgyud 'grel): dzA gre b+h+yo badz+ra d+ha dzA gre trA~M/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pA~M ti pra mo d+ya ka re b+h+yo badz+ra hA s+ya d+haHoM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu ga ta badz+ri d+harma tA sa mA d+hi b+hi s+ya no ma mi tA d+harma gr-id+d+hiHoM sarba ta thA ga ta~M pradz+nyA pA ra mi ta ni ra ha sU na mo ma hA g+ho lA nu ge d+hi/ oM sarba tar+dz+dza
28a1(rgyud 'grel): ga taHkra ak+Sha ra pA ri bA rA tA di sarba sU tAn+ta na yaistu no ma sarba maN+Da le hUM/ oM sarba ta thA g+hA ta san+ta b+hA Sha bud+d+ha sang gI ti birbe ya stu no mi badz+ra b+hA tse bAM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hU pa me g+ha s+pha ra Na pU dza karme ka ra ka ra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta
28a2(rgyud 'grel): puSh+pa pra sa ra s+pha ra Na pU dza karme ki ri ki ri/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta A lo ka dz+wa la s+pha ra Na pU dza karme ka ra ka ra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta gan d+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na pU dza karme ku ru ku ru/ zhes bya bas/ sems dpa' bcu drug dang 'dra ba'i rigs ma las kyi
28a3(rgyud 'grel): rgya dang ldan pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o// de'i phyag rgyu ni 'di rnams yin te/ rdo rje bsdams pa dkur bzhag ste// btsir ba gnyisu byas pa yi// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis na// bsgyings bcas gsor ba gnyis ka yis// lcags kyu
28a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin ltar gnas pa dang // mda' 'phang ba yi tshul dang ni// legaso zhes pa snying gar bzhag/ dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje gnyis// snying gar nyi mo brtan par bya// g.yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs// de bzhin kha phyoTakor bar bya// g.yas pa yis ni
28a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon par dbye// snying gar g.yon pa ral gri mdung// mgal me 'khor lo bskor ba dang // rdo rje gnyis ka kha nas dbyung // rdo rje gar bskor bkrol ba yi// thal mo 'gram pa spyi bor bzhag/ go cha mthe'u chung mche ba dang // khu tshur gnyis
28a6(rgyud 'grel): ni mnan pa'o// de nas phyag bzhi byas la/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen por gnas te/ oM badz+ra At+ma ko ho zhes bya ba 'dis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjer bdag nyid bsgom mo//
28b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas oM swa b+hA ba bi shud d+ho haM zhes bya bas rang bzhin gyis dag par mos par byas la/ oM sarba sa mo ha zhes bya bas bdag med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i lha thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid du bsam par bya'o// de
28b2(rgyud 'grel): nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa' yi ge brgya pa rdo rje'i tshig gam yid kyis bzlas la/ thams cad bdag yin no zhes bsgoms la/ lha thams cad kyi zhal nas sngags kyi sgra 'byung bar bsam zhing / bzlas pa la brtson par byas na de lta
28b3(rgyud 'grel): bus ni/ thams cad kyis bzlas par 'gyu ro// ji srid skyo bar ma gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgoms la/ skyo bar gyur na/ yang mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod la/ mchod yon phul te/ mchod par phyag bzhi byas nas/ phyag rgya gang dang gang
28b4(rgyud 'grel): nas byung ba de dang de nyid las bkrol la/ rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya badz+ra muHzhes bya ba dang dgrol bar bya'o// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gnas kyi nges pa ni bshad zin to// mo bskyod pa la sogs pa'i gnas
28b5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje rin chenA dang / rdo rje chos dang / rdo rje las kyi gnas nyid yin no// rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas ni spyi gtsug yin no// rdo rje rin chen gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya snying ga nas byung ba/ rang gi dbang bskur ba'i
28b6(rgyud 'grel): gnasu gnas pa dang / oM badz+ra rat+na a b+hiShish+tsa zhes bya bas phyag rgya thams cad dbang bskur bar bya'o// de'i rjes la sarba mu tra mai tr-i ku ru ba ra ka pa tsan po zhes bya ba dang / mdzub mo gonyis kyis snga ma bzhin du go cha gos la/ tha mar
29a1(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa'i thal mos snga ma bzhin du mnyes par byas la/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang yi ge brgya pa bzlas nas/ mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu bsngos te/ bdag gis cho ga ma tshang
29a2(rgyud 'grel): ba gang dag bgyis pa de bzod par mdzad cig ces gsol ba btab la/ mchod yon phul nas/ oM kr-i tau b+ha sarba satwAn+taM sid+d+hi maM dat+ta ya thA nu ga gats+tsha taM bud+d+ha bi Sha yaM/ pu na rA ga ma na ya tsa zhes bya bas sangs rgyas dang byang chub
29a3(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' rnams gshegs pa'i phyir bskul bar bya zhing / oM badz+ra satwa muHzhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis/ rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya gyen du dgrol bar bya'o// de ltar na thams cad kyang gshegasu gsol bar 'gyur ro//
29a4(rgyud 'grel): ji lta ba bzhin du sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i tshigs dang bcas pa rnams ni/ de bzhin du yid kyis legs pa'i sbyor bas rang gi lus la bcug la/ rdo rje bsrung ba dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang / rdo rje las kyi
29a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya rnams kyis bdag nyid bsrung ba byas nas langs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi las dang / glegs bam bklag pa la sogs pa bya'o// de ltar nyin re re zhing thun bzhir zla ba gcig gam/ zla ba drug gam/ lo gcig gam/
29a6(rgyud 'grel): dus ji srid kyi lha rnams las snang ba thob par gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bya'o// yang min na snga ma bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po dang / mchod pa la sogs pa byas la/ de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung // chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya// dam
29b1(rgyud 'grel): tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher// byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla// de nas badz+ra At+ma ko la sogs pa'i snying po gsum bzlas la/ de'i don gsum po rnam par bsgoms nas// phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor la bsrungs pa'i sngags lnga po
29b2(rgyud 'grel): gi snying gar rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor sprul la/ sngar bshad pa'i snying pos dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bkod de/ na mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sbyor bas zhugs la/ badz+ra At+ma kaM la sogs pa'i sngags
29b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis de rnams dang gcig tu gyur par byas la/ badz+ra d+hA tur haM swa yang zhes bya bas/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por bdag nyid nges par byas te/ thams cad kyang bdag nyid kho na yin no zhes bsgoms la/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i snying
29b4(rgyud 'grel): po 'am/ sngags zlos shing lha thams cad kyi zhal nas kyang sngags kyi sgra 'byung ba der yang bsam par bya'o// phyogs de lta bu la sogs pas kyang / rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// ngal zhing dub na mtshan brgya rtsa
29b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyad kyi bstod pa dang / mchod pa phyag bzhi byas la/ thun bzhi'i tha mar yang mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bstod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga byas la/ gshegs su gsol bar bya'o// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gsang sngags
29b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni/ rnal 'byor chen pos bsgrub par bya ba yin pas/ dkyil 'khor bsgom par mi nus pa gang yin pa des ni rnal 'byor chen po byas la/ thams cad kyi sngags re re zhing bzlas brjod 'bum 'bum byas la/ badz+ro tISh+Tha zhes lan
30a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dazlas la/ rdo rje spong ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na grub par 'gyuraro// de nas brtsams te bum pa la sogs pa de na mkha' la 'jog pa 'gyuro// rdo rje mdzub sor gnyis legs par//
30a2(rgyud 'grel): rab mnyam gzhag pas bsnams nas ni// shi ba thams cad slong ba ste// rdo rje slong ba zhes bya'o// badz+ra A bai sha a zhes bya ba yang bzlas brjod 'bum byas la/ rdo rje dril bu mar la byugs te/ bsreg lugs stong gis mngon par sbyangs la/ rdo rje
30a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bebs pa'i phyag rgyas bzung la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na de 'grub par 'gyur ba lag na thogs pa thams cad 'bebs par 'gyur// sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o// // de ltar sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas/ gtsug lag khang
30a4(rgyud 'grel): ngam/ kun dgo' ra ba 'am/ yul lam/ grong khyer gyi shwar ram/ byeng gi phyogs kyi char ram/ gang du yid dang mthun pa der dkyil 'khor ba bar bya'o// deng shin tu mnyam zhing snyam la shar du gzhol ba/ tshang dang ldan zhing tshwa sgo can ma
30a5(rgyud 'grel): yin pa'i sa'i char rgyal pos ni khru brgya 'am lnga bcu'o// blon po dang / blon po chen pos ni/ khru lnga bcu 'am nyi shu rtsa lnga'o// tshong dpon nam ded dpon gyis ni khru nyi shu 'am de'i phyed do// sgrub pa pos ni khru bcu gnyis sam drug pa bya'o// de la dang po
30a6(rgyud 'grel): kho nar mngon par 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su/ mi rus kyi bye ma khrag dang dug dang bcas pa dang / mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg gi cho gas dkyil 'khor gyi bgegs bzlog la/ bdag dang slob ma dang sa bdag la sogs pa'i zhi ba'i sbyin
30b1(rgyud 'grel): sreg bya'o// de nas sa sbyang du gzhug par bya ste/ 'dom gang tsam la/ lkog ma 'am/ lte ba 'am/ pus mo nub pa tsam du 'og tu brkos la/ spos chu dri zhim pos spras pa'i sras bkang la/ rdo rje rtse mo yongasu bzlas pa'i spos tshus chag chag btab ste/
30b2(rgyud 'grel): 'thas par bcags la shin tu mnyam par byas pa/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i nang du chud pa/ rta babs bzhis mdzes par byas pa/ sgo bzhi dang skar khung gis yongasu bskor ba/ tha mar dril bu legs par btags pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / bla
30b3(rgyud 'grel): res mchod pa sna tshogs bres pa/ sangs rgyas rin po che la sogs pa'i ras ris dang sku gzugs kyis nye bar brgyan po/ grwa bzhir spos snong bzhag la/ mar me dang gos la sogs pas nye bar mdzes par byas la dris byugs te/ rdo rje
30b4(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin yongasu bzlas pa'i spos chus yongasu bsangs la/ rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge brgya pa lan bdun bzlas par bya'o// sa sbyang ba dang yongasu gzung ba'i cho ga'o// / de nas bdag nyid khrus byas shing lus dris
30b5(rgyud 'grel): byugs lo/ ji snyed pa'i gos dang rgyan gdags shing / shin tu dmar ba'i gos bgos la/ me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing gdong dri zhim par byas la/ yar gyi ngo'i tshe sa brgyad nas brtsams te/ tshes bcu 'am/ tshes bcu gsum
30b6(rgyud 'grel): mam/ bcu bzhi nas brtsams te/ bco lnga'i bar du dkyil 'khor gyi las bya'o// / gnyug mar gnas pa'i sa'i char ni phyag bdar dang bskyang nul byas la/ de bzhin du lag pas reg par byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'
31a1(rgyud 'grel): bzla bar bya'o// de nas cho ga thams cad spyad par bya'o// yang ches bco lnga'i snga d+mo nas brtsams te bya'o// dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i zhag ni/ slob dpon dang slob ma dang bcas pas bsrung bar gnas par bya'o// de la re zhig rgya
31a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su 'dug la/ bdag bsrung ba dang bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa bya'o// de nas rdo rje'i 'khor los dkyil 'khor sprul la/ phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba dang sdom pa gzung la/ rnal 'byor chen po dang khang pa
31a3(rgyud 'grel): brtsegs pa dang gdan la sogs pa bskyed la/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste/ bdag nyid spro ba bskyed par bya'o// deng dus bdag tshe 'bras bu yod// bdag gi gson pa'ang 'bras bur bcas// lha dang dam tshig gis mnyam
31a4(rgyud 'grel): par// gyur par bdag ni som nyi med// byang chub sems dang sems gcig las// mi ldog par ni bdag 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su ni// deng bdag skye bar the tshom med// deng bdag nyi ma dam pa ste// bdag gi mchod sbyin bla na med//
31a5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pa so// dang bdag 'dus pa mchog yin no// dreng nas yan lag thams cad kyis phyag byas te/ spos snod lag tu thogs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o// ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa
31a6(rgyud 'grel): yin// sangs rgyas thams cad dgongasu gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyis pa yis// rdo rje can gyis dkyil 'khor bri// deng 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te// dngos grub 'di ni stsal du gsol zhes brjod la/ dang po'i sbyor ba dang / dkyil
31b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi mchog dang / las kyi rgyal po mchog rnam par bsgoms nas/ yang sgo dbye ba sngon du 'gro ba nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i gnasu dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen pos gnas pa'i bar du byas nas/ de'i sngags zlos pa la brtson pa'i rnal
31b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa la/ sgrub pa'i grogs mchog de bzhin gshegs pa'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas gsol ba gdab par bya'o// de nas langs la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs la phyag
31b3(rgyud 'grel): byas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha'i khams gang bar mngon sum du bsams la/ bdag ni rang nyid rdo rje can// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid// bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che// stobs chen rdo rje can bdag yin//
31b4(rgyud 'grel): bodag ni rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgya lnga// phyag na rdo rje brtan bdag yin// bdag po rdo rje chen po bdag/ byin gyis brlabs par mi 'dur ro// de nas badz+ra dr-iSh+Ti ma Ta zhes bya ba mig gnyisu bkod lA/ yi ge a las rkang mthil gnyisu sna tshogs rdo
31b5(rgyud 'grel): rje bskyed la/ rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te/ badz+ra satwa ut+tiSh+Tha zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor de na mkha'i steng du gdeg go/ de nas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya des bdag nyid lan cig byin gyis brlabs la/ yang phyag rgya chen po
31b6(rgyud 'grel): bcings te/ phyag rgya la gnas de bzhin langs// kun tu rnam par bltas nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes brjod nas// bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongasu bskor// rdo rje lta bas phyogs mtshams dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / ra ba dang 'dra ba
32a1(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ rkang mthil nas yongasu bzung ste/ sa gzhi nas ri rab kyi rtse mo'i bar du rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byas la/ yang bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa byas nas/ sngags dang phyag rgya 'dri dang ldan pas/ gsang ba'i dkyil
32a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dgug par bya'o// oM badz+ra maN+Da la hUM dz+dza/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis mdzub mo dang mthe bong rdo rjer bya ba ni/ dkyil 'khor thams cad 'gugs pa yin no// rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang / ma hA badz+ra tsikra a d+hi tiSh+Tha sid+d+h+ya hUM zhes bya ba 'dis yang
32a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya'o// rdo rje rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgya nyid 'di'i phyag rgya yin no// de nas seng ldeng las byas pa'i rdo rje'i phur bu/ dbus dang grwa bzhir rdo rjes brdung bar bya ste/ oM badz+ra kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM ban+d+ha hUM zhes bya ba'i snying
32a4(rgyud 'grel): po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung ste/ rdo rje rtse lnga pa blangs la/ hUM zlos shing de dang dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar phur bu lnga bskyed la/ lag pa g.yas par rdo rje rtse gsum par byas pas brdung zhing 'di skad ces
32a5(rgyud 'grel): bzlas par bya'o// oM g+haHg+haHg+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya sarba duSh+TAM phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya sarba pA paM phaT/ badz+ra kI lA ya/ badz+ra d+ha ro Adz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin yongasu bzlas pa'i bsang chu'i bum po dkyil 'khor gyi sgor bzhag la/
32a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje khu tshur gyi las kyi phyag rgyas srung ba thams cad brtan par byas la/ rdo rje go chas go bskon par bya ste/ de yang bcing ba'i cho ga sbyor ba la// rdo rje khu tshur rab tu brtag/ rdo rje go chas go bskon pas// dkyil 'khor kun nas bsrung
32b1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// zhes gsungs pa yin no// yang dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la/ dkyil 'khor yongs brtag ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi gnas dris nye bar byugs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i gnasu tsan+dan dang gur kum la sogs pa'i
32b2(rgyud 'grel): lde gus dkyil 'khor grwa bzhi par byas la/ lhag ma rnams ni zlum por bya zhing rang rang gi sngags kyang lan bdun bdun du bzlas par bya'o// de nas na mkha'i phyogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang
32b3(rgyud 'grel): bcing ba dang mnyes pa la sogs po byas la rang gi snying gar btsug ste/ mchod pa lnga pos legs par mchod do// de nas dbang bskur ba'i bum pa 'bru la sogs pa thams cad dang ldan par chu nyung zad gcig blugs la/ rdo rje
32b4(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' la sogs pa bzlas pa'i mchod yon phul te/ spos chu dang me tog kyang bcug la spos kyis bdugs te/ cho ga bzhin du gnas par bya'o// nyin zhag gnyis pa la thun gsum du yang dag par bzla bar bya zhing / de nas
32b5(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur bar bya'o// yang dkyil 'khor du bzlas la/ 'og nas bshad pa'i mtshan nyid bdag nyid chen pos shes par byas la/ rdo rje sems dpa'i spyan sngar gzhag par bya'o// de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje sems dpa'
32b6(rgyud 'grel): dang / sangs rgyas spyan la re re zhing mar la sogs pa'i sreg lugs dbul bar bya'o// lhag par gnas pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o// / de nas phyi rol tu gtor ma byin la/ nye reg byabyos nas/ mtshan brgya rtsa
33a1(rgyud 'grel): brgyad pas bstod de/ me tog la sogs pa dang sgeg mo la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa mchod la/ phyag byas nas slob ma lhag par gnas par bya'o// de la re shig dang por khrus legs par bya'o// gos gtsang
33a2(rgyud 'grel): ma bgo zhing / lag na me tog thogs pa'i slob mas slob dpon la phyag byas la/ 'di skad sgrar gzhug go// dga' chen khyod bdag ston pi bas// slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol// byang chub sems dpa' tshul bstan pa// mgon po
33a3(rgyud 'grel): chen po bdag 'tshalo// dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol// byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// skyabs gsum dag ni bdag la gsol// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon po bdag ni 'jug
33a4(rgyud 'grel): par 'tshal// de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byed du gzhug ste/ rtog pa rnams ni legs par bsdus nas ni// shin tu bsam pa bzang po ldan pas nyon// brjed ngas blo la rdo rje sems sogs pa'i// bde bar gshegs
33a5(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyis byin mi rlob// dbang med bdag gis mi dge bgyis pa dang // rje su yi rang yang na bgyid stsal gang // de dag thams cad byang chub mchog gi ni// spyan sngar da ltar ma lus so sor bshags// bde gshegs sras kyi
33a6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs gnyis zab pa dang // rgya ches 'gro ba ma lus pa yi don// sgrub par byed dang de las gzhan la'ang // rtag tu bdag ni rje su yo ring ngo // thugs rjes khyab pa'i thugs dang ldan gyur cing // blo gros sdig bral gti mug
33b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kun bcom// ma lus rigs kyi pad+ma'i nang zhugs pa// bde bar gshegs pa rnams la skyabs su mchi// blo mchog rnams kyi kun dga' ra ba ste// dman pas 'jigs pa rnams kyi rgyal byed tshal// srid pa'i rnal 'byor pa zil gyis
33b2(rgyud 'grel): gnon pa'i mchog/ gsung mchog chos la bdag ni skyabs su mchi// 'dod chags la sogs sbrul gyi dug bcom zhing // blo gros rnam rgyas thugs rje cher ldan pa'i// brtul zhugs bzang po'i tshogs la skyabs mchi zhing // srid
33b3(rgyud 'grel): dang bral ba rnams la bdag phyag 'tshal// rgyu yi rjes la bdag po'i yul bdag nyid// 'bras bu'i stobs kyi dgra las rgyal gyur pa// snying rje'i rtsa ba zug cing yang dag rtogs// mnyam med byang chub rnam par gzung bar bgyi// sems
33b4(rgyud 'grel): can rnams ni yongasu smin pa 'am// yang na yongasu bskyang bar bya phyir ram+ba// rang gi sems ni dag par bya ba'i phyir// 'di dag thams cad rtsi sogs bzhin du btang // de bzhin tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan shes
33b5(rgyud 'grel): rab bla na med pa ni// 'dog dang gzhan rnams dag por bya ba'i phyir// skad cig re re zhing yang bsgom par bgyi// bde bar gshegs pa'i sngags la mkhas pa yis// chos rgyal rtag tu lhun gyis grub pa ni// 'gro ba 'dri yis thob par
33b6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i phyir// khyad 'phags gnas la bdag ni gnas par bgyi// zhes lan gsum brjod do// bdag gis de skad ces brjod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bdag gi thams cad yongasu gtang bar bgyi'o// bdag gi sems can
34a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par bgyi'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa thams cad dang / thabs kyi bye brag thams cad kyi brtul nas/ mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la rab
34a2(rgyud 'grel): tu bzhag par bgyi'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad yongasu mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyang / sems can 'ga' yang yongasu mya ngan los 'das pa med do zhes sems bskyed par bgyi'o// bdag gis chos thams cad skye ba
34a3(rgyud 'grel): med pa nyid du rje su rtogs par bya'o// bdag gis ma 'ongs pa'i sems dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sems kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bgyi'o// bdag gis thog pa gcig gi tshul du gnas par yang rtogs par
34a4(rgyud 'grel): bgyi'o// bdag gis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la gnas pa so sor rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bslab par bgyi'o// bdag gis stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis chos
34a5(rgyud 'grel): ma 'dres pa rnams so sor rtogs par bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson par bgyi'o// de bzhin du bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa ma lus pa'i bar la mngon par gnas par bya ba'i phyir bsgrub par bgyi'o// 'di nyid ni byang chub
34a6(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub chen por sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
34b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi sras kyi thu bo ste/ 'di nyid ni bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po'o// de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis ji lta bu bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs par bya ba'i stobs kyis bdag sems bskyed pa 'di la gnas pas kun tu bzang po'i
34b2(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa zhes bya ba sgo mtha' yas pa la gnas pa mtha' med par gyur pa rdzogs par byas/ gdul bya'i 'gro ba'i tshogs ma lus pa rnams la spyod pa'i rab tu dbye ba'i sgo mang pos bstan pas yang dag par mgu bar bya ba dang / yang
34b3(rgyud 'grel): dog par dgo' bar bya ba dang / yang dag par gzengs bstod pa la phal sbyar bar bgyi'o// de nas sa ma ya aM zhes bzlas pas slob ma'i snying gor zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la/ de'i steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa de la bzhig la/ su ra ta
34b4(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya s+t+waM ho/ badz+ra sid+d+ha ya thA su khaM zhes bya ba'i snying gar bzlas la/ spyi bor spos chus brlan pa'i lag pa bzhag ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' bzlas shing / rdo rje bsam par bya'o// dpral bar yi ge traM las rin po che/ lkog mar yi ge
34b5(rgyud 'grel): hrIHlas pad+ma/ spyi bor kA~M las sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la/ badz+ra sAtwA/ badz+ra rut+na/ badz+ra d+harma/ badz+ra karma zhes zlos shing rang gi snying ga la sogs par byin gyisde brlab par bya'o// de nas rdo rje dris de rnams kyi lag par dri sbyin par bya ste/
34b6(rgyud 'grel): me tog gis me tog go// bdug pas bdug spos dbul lo// mar mes mar memo'i snang ba bya'o// de nas u dum ba ra dang / a shwad tha la sogs pa'i so shing sor bcu gnyis pa rtse mor me tog bcings pa/ rdo rje bzhod pa bzlas
35a1(rgyud 'grel): la sbyin par bya'o// des kyang shar ram byang du bltas te rtse mo nyid nas bca' bar bya'o// de nas ku sha sar pa la rdo rje rnon po dang / rdo rje sems dpa' yongasu bzlas pa byin nas/ 'dis ni gdan du gding zhing 'dis ni sngas su
35a2(rgyud 'grel): bgyis la nyol cig ces bsgo'o// de nas dpung pa g.yon par ni// rdo rje bsrungs pas bzlas pa yis// bsrung skud mdud pa gsum ldan pa'i// bdag nyid kyis ni legs par bcing // de nas zab cing rgya che ba'i chos ci nus par bsten pas
35a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la gzengs bstod pa byas nas/ bzhin bzangs ngag longs shig/ nang par dkyil 'khor chen po mthong bar 'gyuraro// zhes bsgo ba lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas nyi ma shar kar dkyil 'khor de de bzhin
35a4(rgyud 'grel): du steng du na mkha' la gzhag la thig gdab par bya'o// de la dang por re zhig tshon rtsi sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / dkar po dri zhim pos bsgos pas srad bu so sor kha dog so sor bsgyur la/ go rims 'di nyid
35a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis bzhag nas/ de la hUM trAM hrIHa oM zhes bya ba'i rang rang gi sa bon las mi bskyod pa la sogs pa srad bu la bkod de/ dIp+ta dr-iSh+Ti aM ku sha dzaHzhes bya ba mig gnyis su bkod la/ rab tu g.yo zhing 'bar ba'i mig/ mig gi rdzi ma 'dren
35a6(rgyud 'grel): pa ni// zhes bya ba'i 'bar ba'i lta bas/ mi bskyod pa la sogs pa la bskul zhing / bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po'i thig gdab par bya ba'i phyir/ rdo rje'i thig bdag la stsol cig ces bya bas kyang bskul bar bya'o// de nas
35b1(rgyud 'grel): rang gi sa bon gyi 'od kyis bskul ba'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pas btang ba'i srang bu 'bar ba'i lcags kyus bkug ste/ rang gi lag na gnas pa la sang bus gas sa9/ a n+yo n+ya a nu gra ta sarba d+harmAHpa ra s+pha ra a nu pra biSh+Ta/ sarba d+harmAHa t+yan ta/ a
35b2(rgyud 'grel): nu pA biSh+Ta/ sarba d+harmAHoM badz+ra satwa hUM zhes zlos shing bsgril bar bya'o// bsgril nas/ mig g.yas dang g.yon gnyis su ma dang Ta las nyi ma dang zla ba bskyed la/ badz+ra dASh+Ti maT ces bya bas brtan par byas la/ srang bu de'i dris byugs pa'i
35b3(rgyud 'grel): gser la sogs pa'i snod du legs par bzhag la/ dri dang / me tog dang bdug spos la sogs pas mchod la/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya sU traM mA ti kra ma hU~M zhes bya ba rdo rje bsdams pas bzung ste/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o// de nas
35b4(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' bcu drug bzlas pa'i dris/ dkyil 'khor gyi gzhi yang byugs la/ phyi rol kun tu me tog gis mdzes par byas nas bar snang la bzhugs po'i rigs thams cad mchod yon phul te/ me tog la sogs pa dang / sgeg
35b5(rgyud 'grel): mo la sogs pas thams cad mchod la/ phyag byas te/ mig g.yas dang g.yon du yi ge dza ser po bkod la/ nyi ma dang zla ba ser por snang ba bskyed de/ glu dang rol mo la sogs pa dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor brtag par bya'o//
35b6(rgyud 'grel): de la re zhig sngar sngags bzlas pa'i srad bu dri zhim pa tha ma dkar po dang ldan pa/ yid kyis badz+ra d+hA tu zhes bya ba rdo rje tshig gis bzlas la/ rnam par snang mdzad du gyur par byas nas/ bsgrub pa po'i grogs mchog badz+ra karma zhes brjod de/
36a1(rgyud 'grel): rang gi sbyi nas rdo rnalas kyi gzugs su sprul par bya'o// de nas badz+ra swa zhes brjod de/ rdo rje sems par bdag cad byasams la srang bung g.yon pa'i rdo m+b+ha khu rgyar gyis bzung la/ dza zhes bya bas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog tu/
36a2(rgyud 'grel): las kyi gzugs can gyi lag tu srad bu de btang la/ phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du bsgom zhing / shar phyogs su bltas te rdo rje srang bu gdab par bya'o// yang slob dpon lhor 'dug la/ byang chu du bltos te gnyis pa gdab par
36a3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// de nas me'i phyogs kyi char gnas pa la byang du bltas te phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi shar du thig gdab bo// rlung gi phyogs su gnas te lho phyogs su bltas la nub kyi thig gdab bo// de nyid du 'dug ste byang gi thig gdab bo//
36a4(rgyud 'grel): me'i phyogs su 'dug ste lho phyogs kyi thig gdab par bya'o// kho khyer gyi thig kyang gdab par bya'o// yang me'i mtshams su gnas te rlung gi mtshams kyi bar gyi thig gdab pa dang / yang bden bral gyi mtshams su gnas te dbang ldan gyi
36a5(rgyud 'grel): 'tshams kyi thig gdab par bya zhing / slob dpon dang sgrub pa'i grogs mchog skor phyogs su 'gro bar bya'o// de la re zhig srad bu'i sngags ni/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya sU traM mU ti kA ma hUM zhes bya ba dang / dza zhes bya ba gsum gyis
36a6(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis drang bar bya'o// de la sgron cha brgyad pa'o// sgo khrung ni sgo'i tshod kyi phyed do// kha khyor phye'i thams cad dang nang gi kun ni sgo'i phyed do// tshon sna lnga'i sa kha khyer gyi phyed kyi tshad du bya'o// rta babs ni sgo'i sum
36b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur du bya'o// nang gi dkyil 'khor ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi byed la zur bzhi pa sgo bzhi pa kha khyer gyis yongasu bskor ba/ ka ba brgyad dang ldan par thig btab la/ dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar seng ldeng gi phur bu 'og rdo rje rtse gcig
36b2(rgyud 'grel): pa lta bu la/ steng rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i dbyibs can gyi phur bu la/ rdo rje phur bu'i sngags bzlas la rdo rje tho bas brdungs te snga ma bzhin du btab la/ de la brtod pa'i srad bus nang gi dkyil 'khor dang phyi'i rdo rje phreng ba dbang ldan gyi
36b3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs nas brtsams te g.yas nas bskor ba'i rims kyis gdab par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi tshad kyi nyis 'gyur la/ mtha' bskor khru drug par bya ba ni tshid chung ngu yin te/ gzhan dag tu ni ji tsam 'chim par bya'o// da ni
36b4(rgyud 'grel): lung las gsungs pa'i thig gi mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste/ sar pa las ni bkal nas kyang // tshad dang ldan pa mdzes pa yi// thig gis mkhas pa tsi nus kyis// dkyil 'khor gyi ni thig gdab bo// gru bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi
36b5(rgyud 'grel): dang // rta babs bzhis ni mdzes bgyis la// thig bzhi dang ni ldan gyur pa// dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan// grwa bzhi phyogs ni thams cad du// sgo khyud kyi ni nang rnams su// rdo rje rin chen spras par ni// dkyil 'khor phyi rol
36b6(rgyud 'grel): thig gdab bo// de yi rim pa'i nang zhugs la// 'khor lo 'dra bar rdo rje yi// thig gis yongasu bskor bya zhing // ka ba brgyad kyi mdzes bgyis par// phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid dmigs la// shes rab can gyis thig ga po
37a1(rgyud 'grel): shar dang nub dang byang dang lhor// thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad// nang dang phyi rol gyi kha khyer dang / dra ba dang / dra ba phyed pa dang / rlung yab dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yang bri ba dung / dkyil 'khor gyi
37a2(rgyud 'grel): grwa'i mtshams thams cad du/ rlung gis bskyod pa'i dril bu btags pa'i ba dan sna tshogs btags pa dang / de'i sgo rnams kyi sgo khyud kyis mtshams rnams su// zla ba phyed pa la gnas pa'i rdo rje rin po ches mdzes par bri bar bya'o//
37a3(rgyud 'grel): gal te bgegs byung ba bzlog par 'dod na/ phur bu'i sngags lan 'bum bzlas pa'i phur dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te gdab par bstan pa dang / dbyibs 'dra ba'i phur bus bgegs thams cad la phur
37a4(rgyud 'grel): bus gdab par bya'o// de yang ji skad du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba la btags nas/ shar nas skor phyogs su zlum por bskor ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor thig btab pa de'i phyi rol tu/ khor yug chen po de bzhin du zlum por
37a5(rgyud 'grel): thig btab la 'od kyi dkyil 'khor der grog mkhar gyi sa la sogs pa la bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan byas la/ brgya byin gyis gzugs brnyan shar phyogs na gnas pa la/ yi ge i las brgya byin mdog ser po'o// me la
37a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan la yang de bzhin te/ raM las me lha dmar po/ oM haM las gshin rje nag po/ kaM las srin po nag po/ baM las chu lha dkar po/ yaM las rlung lha dung ka/ phaT las lus ngan po ser po/ su ba zhes bya ba las
37b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang ldan dkar po bskyed la/ rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas bkug ste/ bcug la bcings te dbang du byas nas phur bus gdab bo// shin tu yang yun ringasu bgegs med par byed 'dod pas sas dgab par bya'o// de ltar yang
37b2(rgyud 'grel): gal te bgegs byed na/ rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi sbyor ba byas la/ 'dod pa'i rgyal pos bkug nas/ lcags kyu la sogs pas kyang dgug pa la sogs pa bas te/ rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings te/ rkang pa g.yon pas bgegs
37b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi gzugs brnyan mnan te/ hU~M baM hUM zhes bya ba l-i sogs pas spel ba'i tshul gyis/ g.yon pa brkyang ba'i gnas pas 'dug la/ bgegs byed pa'i sprin la sogs pa la mngon par bltas te/ phyag rgya 'phangs la/
37b4(rgyud 'grel): na mkha'i khams thams cad du spros pas 'od zer 'bar ba kun tu 'khrugs pa'i rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis/ rkang pa bteg cing bsnun pas/ sprin la sogs pa thal bar byas par bsams par bya ste/ de lta bus ni bcom pa nyid du
37b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyuraro// yang na stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon du byas la/ de'i 'og tu a las rnam par snang mdzad du gyur nas/ rgyud las bshad pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur nges par byas la/ haM las 'phags pa mi g.yo ba
37b6(rgyud 'grel): yid kyi thugs ka nas phyung ste/ badz+ra haM ban+d+ha zhes yid la brjod la/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rim du rlung gi phyogs su dris thig le bdun byas te/ thig le re re zhing yang re re'i nang du chud par byas la/ dbus ma dang tha ma dang
38a1(rgyud 'grel): thig le bdun dang ldan par byas te/ thig le bdun po de dag kyang rlung lha bdun po ri dgas lha zhon pa mdog nag po/ 'phags pa mi g.yo bas zhagus pas bkugs nas bcings par gyur par bsams lo//
38a2(rgyud 'grel): de rnams kyis dbus ma gcig ni gtso bo yo ni ya/ lhag ma drug de ni de skor te kun gnas par bsam mo// de nas kham phor a las ri rab tu bsams la/ de'i steng du a nyid las dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor
38a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad du rdo rjes g.yogs pa/ dbus su yang rdo rje rtse lnga pa yi ge hUM gi sa bon las byung ba/ mtshams rnams su mdung rtse gsum pa rnam par bsams la/ de bzhin du badz+ra haM ban+d+ha zhes brjod de/ kham phor des ji skad
38a4(rgyud 'grel): du bshad pa'i thig le bdun dgab par bya'o// de nas kham phor dang ri rab kyi steng du oM las bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bsams te/ 'phags pa mi g.yo ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar g.yon rkyang bas
38a5(rgyud 'grel): ri rab mnan nas/ ral gri dang zhags pos rlung rnams la sdigs mdzub mdzad par bsams te/ de lta bus rlung rnams thams cad bcing bar byas par 'gyur ro// de las chu la sogs pa'i bgegs bzlog pa bshad par bya ste/ haM
38a6(rgyud 'grel): las rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i 'phags pa mi g.yo bar bdag nyid bskyed la/ grog mkhar gyi sa 'am/ ba lang gi lci bas lo ma ltung bas bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas/ khe las ral gri/ r-i las
38b1(rgyud 'grel): me'i snying po bskyed la/ kaM las zhags pa dang / lcags kyu bskyed de/ lag pa g.yon pas bzung la/ lag pa g.yas pas lcags kyu dang zhags pas drangs nas/ bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan gyi nang du bcug ste/ g.yon brkyang
38b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gnas pas gnas la/ rkang pa g.yon pas spyi bo nas bi tsi ra la/ 'di skad ces brjod do// na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM tA ka haM maM zhes brjod nas gzugs brnyan de ral gris gtub par bya'o// dug dang ske tsho
38b3(rgyud 'grel): dang lan tsha la sogs pas gzugs brnyan bskus la mes gdung bar bya'o// me yis gdungs pas de nyid kyang // gdungs par 'gyur bar the tshom med// tshangs pa'am brgya byin yin na yang // de'i mod la myur du 'tshig/ ces bcom
38b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsung so// las 'di dag kyang 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rnal 'byor gyis de'i gsang sngags khri bzlas pa'i sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas/ de'i 'og tu las bya'o// yang oM AHhUM zhes bya ba 'dis
38b5(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed sku mdog nag po/ zhal bzhi pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ zhabs drug pa/ phyag gnyis na ral gri dang dgra ste bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon gnyis na zhogs pa dang gtun shing bsnams pa/
38b6(rgyud 'grel): lho phyogs su gzigs pa/ khro bo'i tshogs rnams kyis na mkha'i khams kun tu gang bar mdzad par rnam par bsams la/ mdung thung gi phyag rgya bcings la/ sprin la sogs pa bzlog pa'i bsams pas tsham ngam dang
39a1(rgyud 'grel): // bcas pas rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la/ mdzub mo gnyis sbyar ba ni mdung thung gi phyag rgya'o// de ltar na yang gal te bgegs zhi bar ma gyur na/ kham phor sau ma btang ba gnyis
39a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi nang du khrag dang dur khrod kyi sol ba dang dug dang ske tshe dang / da du ra'i lo ma'i khu bas sngags bris la/ yungs kar la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas/ kham phor kha sbyar te/ de'i nang du bzhag la/ me'i bgegs la sogs pa
39a3(rgyud 'grel): bsams la/ sreg lugs brgya 'am/ sreg lugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas de dag 'jigs pa 'am/ 'chi ba 'am/ mi ma yin pas gzung bar 'gyur ro// yang na rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi sbyor bas yi ge hUM bzlas brjod 'bum byas
39a4(rgyud 'grel): la/ mi rus kyi rgyu las byas pa'i phur bu sor bzhi pa'i tshad tsam la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ de bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas bkug cing bcug ste bcings nas/ gzugs brnyan la phur bus gdab bo//
39a5(rgyud 'grel): de nas me'i tsha ba zhi ba bshad par bya ste/ me'i steng du baM las chu'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du pad+ma'i dbus su gnas pa'i 'khor lo// de'i steng du ba nyid las bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dung dang kun da ltar dkar bar
39a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs te/ mtsho chen po ma dros pa 'dra ba'i rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las/ chu bo bzhi 'bab pa lta bu'i char gyi rgyun bab pas phyogs bcur 'gengs par gyur par bsams par bya'o// rdo rje spyan dang rdo rje me ltar 'bar bas
39b1(rgyud 'grel): kham phor ri rab dang phur bu yang dag par gsungs la/ rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed spyan ngag gis// de rnams kyi na mkha' bcings pa byas la/ rdo rje bcings pas dra ba bya'o// yang na mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg gi
39b2(rgyud 'grel): bgegs bzlog par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na gnas pa'i phur bu hUM bzhis bton la/ 'og nas bshad pa'i tshon sna lngas phur bu'i bu ga bkang la mnyam por gzhag go// de nas hi zhes bya bas migo g.yos pa dang
39b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon par nyi ma dang zlo ba bskyed la/ khro bo'i lta bas kun tu bltas la/ sgo rnams bya'o// de nas tshon rtsi byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ oM badz+ra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM zhes bya bas 'dis phyag rgya dang ldan pas tshon rtsi thams cad la lan
39b4(rgyud 'grel): bdun gyi bar du mngon par bzlos na rdo rje'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungaso// de la phyag rgya ni 'di yan te/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis las ni// mdzub mo rtse mo mnyam sbyar ba// byas nas
39b5(rgyud 'grel): tshon rtsi thams cad ni// 'bar ba'i lta bas dgug par bya// haM zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje nyi ma'i khro bo'i dam tshig gang gi phyag rgya dang / g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis mthor sbar bar bya'o// oM badz+ra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM zhes zlos shing dbang
39b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan phyogs nas brtsams te/ g.yas nas bskor pos g.yon po'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis tshon rtsi dgye bar bya ste/ phyis ci bder bya'o// de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te/ sngon po dang / ser po dang dmar po dang / ljang gu dang /
40a1(rgyud 'grel): dkar po'o// rim+ba 'dis ci bder dgye'o// khru drug par bya ba ni tshon rtsi'i ri mo chung tshad yin te/ de phan chad khru bkyed pas rkang pa bkyed par bya'o// de yang rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud las/ sngon po rdo rje rtse rang bzhin/
40a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa gser la dmigs pa ste// pad+ma rA ga'i rang bzhin gzhon// de bzhin gzhan dag mar gang 'dra// dkar po nang du shes bya ste// 'di ni tshon gyi rim par bshad// ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so//
40a3(rgyud 'grel): shar phyogs su ni sngon po che// lhor ni ser po dang ldan pa// nub kyi cha ni dmar po ste// byang ni ljang gur yang dag ldan// dbus kyi sau yi cha nyid ni// shel ltar snang ba bla na med// rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang zhing // rab mnyam gzhag ste de yis
40a4(rgyud 'grel): bri/ rdo rje ka ba'i nang logs su// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lngas brgyan la// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs bzhag cing // sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun gyi// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus rnams su// rim
40a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du ni dam tshig mchog/ bzhi po legs par gzhag par bya// dkyil 'khor bzhi po de dag tu// rdo rje gom pas song nas ni// mi g.yo ba la sogs pa yi// sangs rgyas bzhi po thams cad gzhag/ mi g.yo ba yi dkyil 'khor
40a6(rgyud 'grel): du/ rdo rje 'dzin sogs mnyam par bzhag/ rin chen 'byung ldan dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje snying sogs rdzogs par bzhag/ tshe dpag med pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje spyan sogs rdzogs par bzhag/ gdon mi za yi dkyil 'khor du//
40b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rgya gram la sogs bzhag/ 'khor lo yi ni grwa rnams su// rdo rje lha mo rnams kyang bzhag/ dkyil 'khor phyi rol gru rnams su// sangs rgyas mchod pa rnams kyang bzhag/ sgo rnams kun gyi nang du ni// sgo srungs bzhi yang bzhag par bya
40b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor phyi rim phyogs su ni// sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang bzhag/ de la rdo rje shugs kyi snying po ni 'di yin te/ oM badz+ra be gA kra ma hUM/ de la 'di'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ yid kyis ri mo bteg nas ni// rdo rje srang bu 'am gzhan
40b3(rgyud 'grel): yang rung // phyir 'byung nang du zhugs kyang ni// dam tshig nyams par de mi 'gyur// de la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snang mdzad ni// sku mdog dkar po seng ge'i gdan la rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ byang chub mchog gi phyag
40b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa/ nyi ma'i 'od mnga' ba/ dar la'i stod g.yogs dang / smad g.yogs mnabs pa/ rin po che'i cod pan dang dar dpyangs kyis dbang bskur po dang ldan pa// zhal bzhi pa zhal dang po shar du gzigs
40b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// de bzhin du mi bskyod pa la sogs pa yang de bzhin te/ sku mdog kyang sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / glang po che la sogs pa'i gdan la rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ rdo rje rtse lnga pa
40b6(rgyud 'grel): dang / rdo rje rin po che dang / rdo rje pad+ma dang / sna tshogs rdo rje la sogs pa bsnams pa'o// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che cod pan dang / dar dpyangs kyi dbang bskur po dang ldan pa/ zhal gcig rnam par snang
41a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad la mngon sum du phyogs pa rnams rang rang gi phyag rgya chen po drang badz+ra d+hA tu zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i snying po zlos shing bzhugs su gsol la/ byis pa ltar bar snang la bzhugs pa rnam
41a2(rgyud 'grel): kyang de bzhin du phab ste gcig tu bya'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan sngar/ satwA~M badz+ri zhes bya bas rdo rje sems me sku mdog sngon mo// rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po bkod la/ badz+ra A be sha a zhes bya bas dbab
41a3(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// g.yas su rat+na badz+ri zhes bya bas rin chen sems me sku mdog ser mo// yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rtse mo rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'o// rgyab tu d+harma badz+ra zhes bya bas rdo rje chos ma/ sku mdog dmar mo/ pad+ma dkor dmar
41a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dab ma bcu drug pa la 'dab ma brgyad thur du gyes pa/ 'dab ma brgyad gyen du bltas pa kha ma bye ba'i nang na rdo rje rtse lnga be chung pa'o// g.yon du karma badz+ri zhes bya bas/ rdo rje las ma sku mdog ljang gu/ sna tshogs rdo rje rtse mo bcu
41a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa khwa dog lnga pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' la stsogs pa nas bskal pa bzang po'i mthar thug pa'i bar ni/ phyag rgya chen pos rang rang gi mtshan ma/ rdo rje lo sogs pas bsnams pa/ rab tu dgyes pas spyan gdangs pa/
41a6(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa yin no// rnam par snang mdzad ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yin la/ 'odi dag thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings la dmigs pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir/ rnam par snang mdzad
41b1(rgyud 'grel): la mdzad la mngon par phyogs par bya'o// mi bskyod pa'i mdun du ni rdo rje sems dpa'o// g.yas su ni rdo rje rgyal po'o// g.yon du ni rdo rje chags pa'o// rgyab tu ni rdo rje legs pa'o// rin chen 'byung ldan gyi mdun du ni rdo rje rin chen
41b2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o// lkog ma ni shes pa kho nar zad do// phyir dkyil 'khor gyi khyams la byams pa la sogs pa/ bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' bzhi yis stong du ma tshang ba/ shar
41b3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs la sogs pa'i phyogs su cha mnyam po go rims bzhin du bri bar bya'o// de la shar phyogs pa rnams ni rdo rje rtsi lnga pa bsnams pa'o// lho phyogs pa rnams ni rdo rje rin po che bsnams pa'o// nub phyogs pa rnams ni rdo rje pad+ma
41b4(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa'o// byang phyogs pa rnams ni sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa'o// de naso 'di rnams dgod pa'i rim pa dang / mtshan ni 'di yin te/ oM sar+b+ba saM kA ra pa rI shud+d+har+m+ma ti ga ga na sa mung ga te ma hA ya na pa ri bA re swA hA/ zhes bya ba
41b5(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni rig pa'o// de la de rnams kyi mtshan ni/ byams pa/ seng ge/ rab gsal/ thub pa/ me tog/ me tog gnyis pa/ spyan legs/ ded dpon/ legs chen/ stobs chen/ rgyu skar rgyal po/ rtsi sman/ snyan po tog/ 'od chen
41b6(rgyud 'grel): po/ grol ba'i phung po/ rnam par snang mdzad/ nyi ma'i snying po/ zla 'od 'phro/ 'od bzang / mya ngan med/ skar rgyal/ rab gsal/ phreng thogs/ yon tan 'od/ don gzigs/ mar me/ mthu ldan/ sman pa/ nges pa/ mdzod bu/ brtan
42a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan/ lha'i dpal/ gdugs dga'/ yon tan rgyal mtshan/ sgra gcan/ tshogs can/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ tshig brtan/ mi 'gying ba/ 'od mdzad/ lhun chen/ rdo rje/ sdom pa can/ mi bsnyengs pa/ rin chen/ pad+ma'i spyan/
42a2(rgyud 'grel): stobs sde/ me tog 'od zer/ ye shes dgyes/ gzi chen/ tshangs pa/ 'od dpag med/ klu sbyin/ brtan par gshegs/ don yod mthong / brtson 'grus sbyin/ bzang skyong / dga' bo/ 'chi med/ seng ge'i rgyal mtshan/ rgyal
42a3(rgyud 'grel): ba chos// mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po/ kha lo bsgyur/ dgyes par gshegs// chu lha// yon tan lag/ spos kyi glang po/ rnam par gzigs/ 'brug sgra/ legs sems/ yid bzangs// dri med// zla ba/ grags chen// gtsug na nor bu/
42a4(rgyud 'grel): drag shul can// seng ge'i stabs// ljon pa/ rnam par rgyal ba can// shes rab brtsegs/ legs gnas blo gros/ yan lag skyes// blo mtha' yas// gzugs bzang // mkhyen ldan// 'od zer// brtul zhugs brtan// bkra shis//
42a5(rgyud 'grel): badren pa'i rtog/ pad+ma/ sred med kyi bu/ lag bzangs/ ye shes 'byung gnas/ yon tan 'od 'phro/ tshangs pas byin/ rin chen 'obyung gnas/ lha'i me tog/ don legs sems pa/ chos kyi dbang phyug/ blo gros grags pa/ spobs pa
42a6(rgyud 'grel): brtsegs pa/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan/ phan par bzhed pa/ rnam par rol ldan/ mun pa dang bral ba/ skye gcan lha/ ri bo'i rgyal mtshan/ tshogs can 'od / rin chen snying po/ shin tu mthor gshegs/ skar rgyal/ ru rings/ yon tan
42b1(rgyud 'grel): grags pa/ nyi zla/ nyi ma'i 'od/ skar mkhan seng ge'i tog/ dus mkhyen rgyal po/ dpal gyi snying po/ srid mtha' gzigs pa/ glog gi 'od/ gser gyi ri bo/ seng ges byin pa/ gzhan gyis mi thub rgyal mtshan/ mchog dga' grags
42b2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ brtson 'grus brtan pa/ grags pa rdzogs pa/ bsnyengs pa dang bral ba/ mchod 'os lha/ sgron ma chen po/ 'jig rten 'od/ spos dri zhim pa/ yon tan mchog 'dzin/ mun pa dang rnam par bral ba/ seng ge'i 'gram pa/ rin chen grang
42b3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ skyon rab zhi ba/ bdud rtsi 'chang ba/ mi'i zla ba/ shin tu gzigs pa/ rab tu rgyan pa/ nor bu'i 'od/ ri bo brtsegs pa'i tog/ chos kyi 'byung gnas/ tshe sbyin/ rin chen 'byung gnas/ skye dbang mtshungs pa/ stabs kyis gshegs
42b4(rgyud 'grel): ba/ blo gnas/ gdugs mdzes pa/ gtso bo/ shin tu 'phags da la/ seng ge'i sgra/ rnam rol ldan pa/ klu'i 'od/ me tog ri bo/ klu dga'/ spos kyi dbang phyug/ shin tu grags pa/ stobs kyi lha/ yon tan phreng ldan/ klu'i lag pa/
42b5(rgyud 'grel): mig brgyan pa/ legs par sbyangs pa'i blo/ zil gnon ye shes/ mtha' yas+ye pa'i spyan/ bde bar gsung / nyi ma'i 'od/ dris pa'i blo/ mtha' yas gzugs/ rnam par snang mdzad/ rin chen tog/ the tshom rnam par spangs
42b6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ 'jig rten 'das pa/ don yod/ rnam par gnon pa/ rtog par mdzad pa/ me tog rgyal mtshan/ ri dbang rgyal po/ gzi brjid chen po/ don mdzad gzigs pa/ grags pa mtha' yas/ rin chen lha/ don gnas mkhyen pa/ blo
43a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa// mya ngan med pa/ dr-i ma dang bral ba// tshangs m+b+ha/ sa dbang phyug/ me tog spyan/ rnam par 'byes pa'i sku/ chos kyi 'ong/ kun gzigs/ yon tan 'od gsal/ zla ba'i zhal/ rin chen 'odang / ran chen d+haH
43a2(rgyud 'grel): grags pa'i bla ma/ 'od byed gzi brjid dpag med/ dus mkhyen seng ge'i sku mkhas blo/ rgyal bar dga'/ yon tan phung po/ zla ba'i tog/ mthu thob/ mthu rtsal mtha' yas/ zla ba/ dri med/ don thams cad gzigs pa/ dpa' bo/ 'byor
43a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan// bsod nams// sgron ma/ yon tan 'od 'phro blo yangs// legs skyes// nor lha/ yid gnyis spong / 'dzin pa dpag med/ mchog sred// choms med// mi gnas pa/ der gnas/ tshogs can gtso bo/ 'gro ba'i 'od zer//
43a4(rgyud 'grel): phal chen rgyal ba/ gzi brjid mtha' yas/ don blo glos/ sman pa'i rgyal po/ tha ba spangs pa/ rims nad med pa/ legs sbyin/ grags byin/ me tog byin/ skyes bu byin/ rdo rje sde/ phal chen sbyin/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ spos kyi glang
43a5(rgyud 'grel): po/ snyed med kyi bu/ nges pa/ mi tshugs pa/ nyi zla/ glog gi tog/ mchod pa/ zhes bya ba ste/ nyis brgya lnga bcur gcig gis mi tshungs pa ni shar phyogs kyi khyams kyi nang du bris par bya'o// / dpal sbas/ ye shes nyi
43a6(rgyud 'grel): ma/ don grub/ lhun po brtsegs/ dgra 'dul/ pad+ma/ dgra bcom grags pa/ ye shes 'gros/ nyon mongs bral/ 'dam bu/ spos bzangs/ yul 'khor rangs/ lha grags/ srid mtha' gzigs/ zla ba/ sgra gcan/ rin chen zlab
43b1(rgyud 'grel): seng ge'i rgyal mtshan/ bsam gtan dgyes/ rdzogs ldan/ rnam par rol pa/ yon tan rin chen/ dgra bcom grags pa/ pad+ma'i ngos/ mdzod spu ldan/ spobs pa grags/ rdo rje nor bu/ tshe dpag med/ nor bu bkod/ dbang
43b2(rgyud 'grel): chen/ yon tan 'byung gnas/ lhun po grags/ 'od zer bcu pa/ ma smad pa/ glang po'i 'gros/ yid 'thang / rin chen zla ba/ zhi ba/ rab gsal rgyal po// kha lo sgyur/ dga' ba'i dbang phyug/ gtsug na rin po che/ bsnyengs
43b3(rgyud 'grel): bral/ rin chen snying po/ zla zhal/ dri ma med par grags pa/ zhi ba'i gzi baN+Did/ dga' ba'i tog/ sgra gcan lha/ na tshod bzang po/ lha dga'/ rin tshon phung po/ mdzes par gshegs/ seng ge'i phyogs pa/ shin tu mthor
43b4(rgyud 'grel): gshegs/ skye ba'i dbang po/ blo gros bzang po/ 'jig rten 'od/ rin chen gzi baN+Ding / skal ldan/ shing rta/ kun tu rgyal ba/ dga' ba bkod pa/ stobs mdzad pa/ spos kyi glang po/ blo gros 'od 'phro/ ri bo'i rgyal mtshan/ rin chen
43b5(rgyud 'grel): spos bzang / chos brtan/ gzi brjid drag shul can/ chos kyi nor bu/ bzang pos byin pa/ bde gshegs zla ba/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ seng ge'i zla ba/ mtshungs pa med pa'i dpal/ legs par skye ba/ thub pa med pa'i tshogs/
43b6(rgyud 'grel): grags pa'i bshes gnyen/ bden pa/ dka' thub chen po/ lhun po'i 'od zer/ yon tan brtsegs pa/ mchod pa grags pa/ chos grags/ sbyin pa'i 'od/ glog 'byin/ bden par gsung ba/ 'otsho byed/ na tshod bzang po//
44a1(rgyud 'grel): legs pa'i tshogs can rnam par nges pa'i blo gros/ srid mthu' nor bu'i spos/ rgyal bas dgyes pa/ seng ge'i 'od zer/ rnam par snang mdzad/ grags pa mchog/ thugs rab tu gzhungs pa/ nor bu'i zla ba/
44a2(rgyud 'grel): drag shul 'od zer/ brtul zhugs thub med/ 'gro bas mchod pa/ nor bu'i tshogs/ 'jig rten bla ma/ glang chen seng ge/ zla ba/ rin chen 'od zer/ sgra gcan sbed pa/ yon tan rgya mtsho/ 'od zer ldan pa/ rab tu zhi ba'i stabs/ 'jig
44a3(rgyud 'grel): rten bzang po/ mya ngan med pa/ shugs bcu pa/ stobs la dgyes pa/ mthu dpal/ mthu thob pa/ mthu chen po/ yon tan snying po/ bden par skyed pa/ dge mchog rgyal po/ skar rgyal/ 'od zer chen po/ glog gi 'od/ yon tan rgya chen/ rin poche
44a4(rgyud 'grel): dpal 'ong / bdud 'dul bar mdzad pa/ go cha bgos pa/ seng ge'i phyag/ me tog bzang po/ rin chen mthon po/ rgya mtsho/ sa 'dzin/ don gyi blo mnga' ba/ yon tan bsags pa/ yon tan tshogs/ rin chen me/ 'jig rten 'das pa/ 'jig
44a5(rgyud 'grel): rten zla ba/ dbyangs snyan pa/ tshangs pa'i tog/ tshogs can gtso bo/ seng ge'i stabs/ drag shul gyis byin pa/ chos kyi dbang phyug/ gzi brjid 'ong / 'od zer chen po/ rin chen grags pa/ tshogs can gsal ba/ grags pa mtha' yas//
44a6(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer don yod/ lha'i drang srong / skye ba'i dbang po/ dge 'dun brtan/ phyogs bzang / tog/ yul 'khor me tog/ chos kyi blo gros/ rlung gi shugs ltar gshegs pa/ logs bsams grags pa/ snang ldan/ lha tshogs/ yon tan
44b1(rgyud 'grel): bsrungs/ don gyi blo gros/ bsnyengs med/ grogs brtan/ 'od gnas mtshungs/ nor bu'i zhabs/ thar pa'i gzi brjid/ ngos bzangs/ blo bzangs/ kun tu gzi brjid/ ye shes mchog/ tshungs par gnas/ bden par gsung // blo bzangs
44b2(rgyud 'grel): stobs byin/ seng ge stabs/ me tog/ ye shes 'byung gnas/ me tog byin/ yon tan snying po/ rin chen grags pa/ grags pa rmad du byung ba/ mi mtshungs pa/ brnyengs med/ nyi ma'i 'od / tshangs par gshegs pa/ lha'i mthu rtsal
44b3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes dgyes/ lha bden/ nor bu'i snying po/ ye shes dpal/ bcings med/ brtul zhugs brtan/ lha'i gzi brjing / tshangs pa thub/ dal gyis bzhud/ brtul zhugs/ dka' thub/ 'od zer phung po/ gzi brjid chen po/ tsam pa ka/
44b4(rgyud 'grel): dga' mdzad / tshogs can bzang po/ dbang po'i rgyul mtshan/ dgyes pa chen po/ sna ma'i me tog 'ong / tshogs can 'od / snun par mdzad/ mdangs 'gro/ don legs nges// khyu mchog/ lag bzangs/ 'od zer chen po/ bsam pas
44b5(rgyud 'grel): byin/ bsod nams 'ong / rin chen dbyangs/ rdo rje'i sde/ 'byor ldan/ seng ge'i stobs/ dri ma med pa'i spyan/ 'od bsrungs/ blo gsal/ ye shes 'gros/ gzi brjid drag shu la can/ 'od zer chen po/ nyi ma'i 'od dri ma med pa'i 'od/
44b6(rgyud 'grel): gzi brjid rnam par 'byes pa/ khengs med/ sbrang rtsi'i zhal/ zlo 'od glog sbyin/ rab tu zhi bar gshegs/ mi 'khrugs pa/ dgra bcom grags pa/ chos kyi yon tan/ zhing bzang po/ bkong ba'i rgyal po/ mngon par 'phags pa/ sbyin
45a1(rgyud 'grel): sreg 'od 'phro/ pad+ma'i dpal/ rin po che'i bkod pa/ shin tu bzang po/ rin po che'i mchog/ thugs byin tu gsungs pa/ 'od dpag med/ rgya mchos byin/ rlangs pa'i tog/ zla ba'i gdugs/ 'od 'phro ba/ dri meng rgyal po/ 'dri nas/
45a2(rgyud 'grel): nilho phyogs kyi khyams kyi nang du bri bar bya'o// / ye shes grags pa/ kun las rgyal ba/ yon tan 'od / sgra rnam par grags pa/ zla ba rgyas pa/ pad+mo'i 'od zer/ brtul zhugs bzang po/ sgron ma rgyal po/ glog gau tog/ 'od zer
45a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po/ skar mkhan/ grags pa rdzogs ldan/ pad+ma'i snying po/ rgyal spyan mdzes/ rnyog pa med pa'i don/ drag shul sde/ bsod nams gzi brjid/ mthu rtsal can/ thogs med blo/ sgra gcan lha/ ye shes phung po/ kha lo sgyur ba/ skye dbang
45a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs pa/ me tog tog/ sgra gcan 'dzin/ rtsi sman chen po/ rgyu skar rgyal po/ sman pa'i rgyal po/ bsod nams glang po/ mchod par mdzad pa/ rnam par grags pa'i rgyal po/ nyi ma'i 'od zer/ chos kyi mdzod/ blo gros bzang po/ yon
45a5(rgyud 'grel): tan dbang mtshungs/ rdo rje'i sde/ shes rab brtsegs/ legs par gnas/ blo sbyangs/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ yon tan mchog/ 'brug sgra dbyangs/ mngon par shes pa'i tog/ tog gi 'od / mi 'dren dge ba/ tshangs pa/ skyes mchog
45a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyar sdug/ klus byin/ bden pa'i tog/ brgyan pa/ zhums pa med dbyangs/ rin chen 'od / dbyangs byon/ seng ge/ 'od zer sna tshogs// ye shes dpa' bo/ pad+ma'i phung po/ me tog rgyas pa/ mthu rtsal stabs/ bsod nams phung po/
45b1(rgyud 'grel): gzugs mchog/ skar mkhan/ zla ba'i sgron ma/ gzi brjid phung po/ byang chub rgyal po/ mi zad pa/ mngon par rtogs pa'i spyan/ yan lag rgyas pa/ yul 'khor shes rab mchog/ gzi brjid tshim mdzad/ shes rab byin/ 'jam dbyangs/
45b2(rgyud 'grel): chags pa med mdzad/ gtso bos byin/ gtso bo/ ye shes mthu rtsal/ 'od 'phro can/ dbang po/ shugs 'chang skar rgyal/ 'od bzang po/ grags pa byin pa/ gzugs bzang po/ rgyal po/ don grub pa/ seng ge'i sde/ nor lha'i bu/ grags pa/ rgyal
45b3(rgyud 'grel): ba/ brgya byin snying po/ bsod nams 'od zer/ 'od zer bzang po/ smyung 'don/ sgron ma'i rgyal po/ ye shes brtsegs lha mchog/ sa'i bdag po/ rnam par grol ba brnyes pa/ gtsug gi gser/ sgra gcan bzang po/ thub dka'/ thub gsal/ zla
45b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i 'od zer/ gser gyi 'od/ legs byin/ lha'i yon tan dbang po/ chos kyi gdugs/ bsod nams lag/ chags pa med pa/ ye shes gya nom/ blo gros zhib mo/ gzi byin thams cad pa/ rtsi stan/ rnam par grol ba'i tog/ 'od kyi mdzod/ ye shwa
45b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po/ 'jigs mdzad/ chu bo spong ba/ thogs med grags pa/ bden pa'i phung po/ dbyangs snyan pa/ ri dbang mtshungs/ chos brtsegs/ thar pa'i gzi byin/ legs mdzad/ rab tu zhi ba'i sku/ yid du 'ong ba'i gsung / blo stangs/ chu lha/ 'gro bas
45b6(rgyud 'grel): cho/ seng ge'i logs/ chos kyi mthu rtsal/ skal pa bzang po/ mi 'khrugs pa'i mdog/ gzi brjid rgyal po/ rtag mdzad/ spyan legs/ don la gnas pa'i blo dang ba/ snang ba'i 'od zer/ spris kyi gzi brjid / kun tu dga' bar mdzad pa/ don yod
46a1(rgyud 'grel): par gshegs pa/ khro ba bcom pa/ gzugs mchog/ legs gshegs/ rab tu sbyin par grags pa/ 'od gtsang / lha'i nyi ma/ shes rab byin/ mnyam par bzhag pa'i bdag nyid/ gzi mdangs/ rgyal rigs/
46a2(rgyud 'grel): skal ldan shing rta/ gser mchog rnam par grol ba'i gtsug/ chos ldan/ spos gnas/ dregs pa spangs/ ye shes kyi mdzod/ tshangs par gshegs/ tsan+don/ mya ngan med pa/ seng ge'i 'od zer/ yul 'khor tog/ pad+ma'i snying
46a3(rgyud 'grel): po/ gzi brjid mtha' yas/ lha'i 'od zer/ shes rab me tog/ mkhas pa/ ye shes 'byor ldan/ tshangs pa dbyig/ phyag na rin chen/ dbang ldan rdzogs par gsung ba/ mchog gsung / mchod 'os/ skar rgyal/ nyi ma/ 'dam las
46a4(rgyud 'grel): rgal ba/ ye shes brnyes/ grub pa/ rma bya/ chos sbyin/ phan par bzhed pa/ ye shes ldan pa/ grags pa/ 'od zer gyi drwa ba/ rnam par bcom pa/ bai DUr+ya'i snying po/ me tog lha'i rgyal po/ zla ba/ dran pa'i 'od/ dge ba'i 'od / yon
46a5(rgyud 'grel): tan mchog ma kun 'od/ rin po che'i dpal/ skyes bu zla ba/ sgra gcan/ bdud rtsi'i 'od/ 'jig rten mchog/ skar ma'i 'od / zhi ba'i stabs/ ye shes rgya mtsho/ ri'i dbang po/ rab tu zhi ba/ yon tan mtha' stobs/ lha'i dbang ngo //
46a6(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs snyan pa/ ngos bzang / don la gnas po/ yon tan gzi brjid dpal/ mkhyen ldan zla med pa/ nga ro dpag med/ 'od zangs/ shin tu thugs gzhungs pa/ don dgongs gti mug bral/ dbyangs kyi yan lag khyad 'phags/
46b1(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu mdzes par gshegs pa/ zhi ba'i don/ skyon med/ blo dbyangs dge ba/ pad+ma'i mdzod/ 'od zer bzang po/ spobs pa'i mdog/ stegs bzang po/ tshogs kyi dbang po/ bsnyengs dang bral ba/ ye shes bzhed pa/ spobs pa'i spyan/ blar
46b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ zla ba/ rin chen zla 'od/ bsnyengs pa med pa/ gzi brjid chen po/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ dbyangs bzang po/ shes rab chen po'i stegs// blo gros zla med/ rdo rje mkhregs pa/ byang chub blo gros/ ljon shing dbang po/ gaudangs
46b3(rgyud 'grel): snyan pa/ bsod nams stobs/ mthu'i dpal/ 'phags pa dgyes pa/ mthu stobs/ skar ma la dgyes pa/ sprin gyi rnga sgra/ 'di rnams ni nub kyi phyogs kyi nang du bri bar bya'o// // spyan sdug pa'i zhal/ ye shes bzang ldan//
46b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor par ldan pa/ yon tan phung po/ gsal ba/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan/ ye shes du ro/ na mkhye'/ mchod sbyin pa ru/ shes rab rnam rgod pa ro// yon tan khyod zer gzi bAN+Did/ drang srong dbong po/ blo dang ldan pa/ spobs pa'i tshigs
46b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod sbyin bzang po/ zla ba'i zhal/ shin tu gzigs pa/ rdul dang bral ba/ yon tan tshogs/ tog dang ldan po/ bsod nams rgyal mtshan/ yul 'khor spobs pa/ rin chen rab sbyin/ zla ba dgyes pa/ seng ge 'i stobs/ dbang
46b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyar rgyal po/ bdud rtsi gsal ba/ bsam gtan snyoms pa/ 'khrug pa med pa/ dri ma rab zhi/ phyogs ma slad pa/ mdzes pa zhal bzangs/ shugs gnas ye shes ldan pa/ gsung ba'i dbang po/ blo gros zab mo// bdud rtsi/ chos
47a1(rgyud 'grel): // kyi stobs/ mchod par ldan/ me tog 'od/ khams gsum mchod gnas/ sa gcan nyi ma'i snying po/ lha'i mchod pa/ thar pa'i rgyal mtshan/ dge ba'i gtsug/ bdud rtsi 'od/ rdo rje brtan pa/ rin chen phung po/
47a2(rgyud 'grel): par gshegs pa/ nyi ma ltar gshegs pa/ dga' ba'i 'od yon tan gtsug/ dpal rdzogs// se ge 'i stobs/ gyen du 'phags pa/ me tog byin/ 'od 'gyed// pad+ma/ ye shes dgyes/ bkod pa mdzes/ gti mug med pa gan la
47a3(rgyud 'grel): gla med pa/ tog gi rgyal mtshan/ bde bar dgongs/ gti mug med pa'i rgyal po/ cho ga mkhyen/ dag pa'i rgya mtsho/ rin chen mnga'/ mi dma' ba/ skye bo dga' bar mdzad pa/ rma bya'i pa ro// ma zhum pa/ srid pa'i sred pa dri ma spangs pa/ slong pa'i
47a4(rgyud 'grel): stegs/ lha mang pos snyan par grags pa/ rin po che'i stabs/ phyag na pad+mo bsnams pa/ dpal/ dgra las rgyal ba/ 'byor ldan grags pa/ yul 'khor bzang po/ me tog 'ong / seng ge'i nga ro// zla ba lta shir ba/ 'joms pa'i mtsho// mi
47a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yo ba/ phan pa dang ldan par gshegs pa/ bsod nams sgron ma'i rgyal po/ dbyangs kyi bskul ba/ gau ta ma/ mdangs stobs/ blo gnas pa'i rang bzhin/ zla ba bzang po/ byang chub yan lag me tog/ bkra shis/ legs ston/ ye shes
47a6(rgyud 'grel): ka'i brjid stobs// dge pa'i sgronas/ mthu rtsal brtan po/ snga dgra/ rab tu bri ba/ nyi ma'i zhal/ thar pa'i rtul zhugs/ tshul khrims 'od / brtul zhugs gnas// rdul med/ snying po 'phags/ yig sbyar/ 'phel bar mdzad la/ spros rgya
47b1(rgyud 'grel): dus mkhyen 'ong / dran pa'i dbang po/ thogs pa med pa'i rgyal mtshan/ byang chub mchog bgrod/ spyod pa gsal/ rin chen dgyes/ chos kyi dbang phyug/ lha thams cad pa/ bshes gnyen chen po/ bshes gnyen bzang po/ rab tu zhi ba'i stobs/
47b2(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi'i bdag po/ lhun po'i 'od / 'phags pas stong pa/ snang ldan// gzi brjid 'bar ba/ snang ba gzigs/ legs spyan rnam par smin/ legs dgyes/ mya dran bral/ rin chen 'od / spyod pa dang ldan pa/ bsod nams stobs/ yon tan
47b3(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho/ rmad du byung ba/ nga rgyal spyong / bdud brlags par mdzad pa/ brag chags las rgal ba'i stobs/ mi phyed pa'i blo minga' ba/ rgya mtsho/ dag par mdzad pa/ tshogs can grol ba'i rgyal po/ dga' ba'i 'od / byang chub rgyal mtshan/
47b4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes rin chen/ shin tu bsil ba/ tshangs pa rgyal ba/ ye shes dgyes/ rdzu 'phrul tog/ skye dbang mtshungs pa/ sa'i dbang phyug nyi ma dgyes/ sgra gcan zla ba/ me tog 'ong / sman pa'i bdag po/ mdangs mnga'/ bsod nams dgyes//
47b5(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba'i stobs/ dbyangs snyan pa/ chos kyi dbang phyug/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ spyod pa bzang ngo // 'khrul pa med pa'i blo/ dbyangs chen po snyan par grags pa/ tog ldan/ gzi brjid/ rnam par grags pa/ 'gro ba'i dbang phyug
47b6(rgyud 'grel): ljon pa/ gti mug rab zab/ dpag tu med pa/ zla ba bzang po/ spobs pa mtha' yas tog/ brtul zhugs bstar ba/ mchong pa'i gnas/ mya ngan rgal/ dge ba dgyes pa/ 'gro ba'i blo gros dgyes par gshegs pa/ zhabs
48a1(rgyud 'grel): ma sa/ ut+pAl/ dus gnas skye d+hoH/ stongs bu mthu' mas 'od zed// drang srong gsal bu/ yon tan brtson 'grus/ rlung gA sgyu'i bdag ga/ ran chen mthon po// gsal ba/ skal ldan shing dz+nyAtsan/ bsod nams b+h+yo sa
48a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg 'od 'phro/ yon tan mtha' yas/ gaN+DI brjing phung po/ seng ge stabs/ maM g.yo ba/ rab gsal 'od spyod pa/ glu dbyangs/ 'khor lo 'dzin pa/ dbyig gi mchog/ 'jig rten dga' ba/ dga' ba mthAbyA yas grags pa/ sprin gyi tig/
48a3(rgyud 'grel): shes rab 'gros/ spros bzangs/ na mkha'i dbyings// lha/ lha'i rgyal po/ nor bu gsal ba/ nor bzangs// sgron ma/ rin tshonu nga ro dbyangs/ skye dpung rgyal po/ sgra gcan sdud pa/ dge ba mdzad/ srang ge'i blo gros/ rin chen grags pa/ don
48a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa/ mdzad mtha' gzigs pa/ srid pa'i me tog/ mdzod spu ldan pa/ spobs pa mtshungs med pa rgyal po/ ye shes rnam 'byed nga ro// seng ge'i mche ba/ mdzes par gshegs pa/ bsod nams sgron ma/ bkra shis ldan pa/ yul 'khor mya
48a5(rgyud 'grel): med pa/ blo gros sems pa/ blo dang ldan pa/ chos kyi sgron ma spyan/ shin tu gzigs pa/ shugs kyis 'dor ba/ stobs chen/ shes rab me tog/ brtan pa'i dbyangs/ bde dang ldan pa/ don gsung ba/ dgyes pa gsal ba/ seng ge'i zhal
48a6(rgyud 'grel): gtsug pud/ snang bar mdzad pa/ 'di rnams ni byang phyogs kyi khyams kyi nang du bri bar bya'o// // yang na byams pa dang / mthong ba don yod dang / ngan song kun 'dren dang / mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros
48b1(rgyud 'grel): spos kyi glang po/ dpa' bar 'gro ba/ namakha'i mdzod/ ye shes tog/ 'od dpag tu med pa/ zla ba'i 'od/ bzang skyong / dra ba can gyi 'od/ rdo rje snying po/ blo gros mi zad pa/ spobs pa brtsegs pa/ kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba bcu drug po ji ltar mngon
48b2(rgyud 'grel): par dga' ba'i sku mdog dang / rgyan dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i cod pan dang dar dbyangs kyis dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa dgod par bya'o// / phyogs bzhi yang rta babs bzhi dang ka ba brgyad/ khru drug gam bdun gyi tshad tsam
48b3(rgyud 'grel): rin po che la sogs pa'i rgyu las byas pa/ me tog gi phreng ba dang dril bu dang dar la sogs pas brgyan pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' mngon par bzlas par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs kyi char/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
48b4(rgyud 'grel): phyin pa dang / sdong pos brgyan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba dang / gser 'od dam pa klog tu gzhug/ chos smra ba de dag kyang sangs rgyas ltar ci nus pas/ mchod par bya'o// de lta bus ni bgegs thams cad nye
48b5(rgyud 'grel): bor zhi ba dang / dkyil 'khor grub par 'gyuraro// phyogs mtshams brgyud du spos snod las ga pur dang / a ka ru dang / du ru ka dang / tsan dan l-i sogs pa rgyun mi 'chad par gtul bar bya'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor
48b6(rgyud 'grel): legs par bkod nas// / phyi rol nye 'khor kun du dris nye bar byugs la/ me tog gi sil ma bkram nas/ rgongs ka'i dus su/ rdo rje sems dpa' dam tshig gi phyag rgyas me tog gi phreng ba blangs la/ rdo rje shugs
49a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o zhing / oM badz+ra satwA ts+tsha zhes kyang brjod par bya'o// yang dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lhag pa dang ma chang ba nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bltas la/ rdo rje dril bu dkrol zhing dkyil 'khor/
49a2(rgyud 'grel): la lan bdun skor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa la/ phreng ba phul te/ rdo rje gor byas nas blangs la rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o// oM badz+ra satwa hUM zhes kyang rgyun mi 'chad pa kho nar bzla bar bya'o// de yang rdo rje dril bu
49a3(rgyud 'grel): rab bskul bas// sangs rgyas ma tshang yongasu skong // lhag pa gang yin 'dor mdzad pas// grub gyur smad par mi bya'o// zhes gsungs pa yin no// de'i rjes la yi ge hUM las bdag nyid rdo rje hUM mdzad du bsam par bya'o// de nas dbus
49a4(rgyud 'grel): bdug nas ni// rdo rje slob dpon mnyam gzhag pas// rdo rje sgo ni rnam bzhi po// yid kyis su ni dbye bar bya// oM badz+ro g+hu Ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha d+h+waM/ rdo rje mdzub mo yang dag sbyar// sbyar ba bkan te bsdams nas su// rab tu khros nas dbye bA ni// sgo
49a5(rgyud 'grel): dbye ba yi mchog yin no// de nas rin po che'am sa las byas pa'i bum pa/ rtsa ba mi gnag pa/ gsus pa che ba mgrin pa ring ba/ mchu 'chang ba/ byu ru dang / gser dang / dung dang mu tig dang pad+ma rA gA ste rin po che thams cad dang / bI ha sti dang
49a6(rgyud 'grel): kaN Da ka ri dang / ha sa dang / daN Do ta pa la dang / she ta a pa rA d+hI ta ste sman thams cad dang / 'bras dang nas dang gro dang til dang / ma sha ste 'bru thams cad dang / spos chu dri zhim pa dang / me tog dkab po dri zhim pas yongasu bkang la
49b1(rgyud 'grel): dris kun tu byugs pa'i me tog gi phreng ba btags la/ mgul pa rnyas dkar po bzang pos bcings pa/ 'dab ma dang 'bras bu dri zhim pas kha brgyun pa/ sngar bsnyen pa byas pas mchod yon phul la rdo rje bsdams pa la sems ma
49b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje mas yongasu gzung ba'i rdo rje me tog gi lcug ma las/ oM badz+ra satwa hUM zhes lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ badz+ra u de ka hUM zhes bya ba yang bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas la/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i spyan
49b3(rgyud 'grel): sngar gzhag go/ gnyis pa la yang rdo rje sems dpa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ 'jug pa'i sgor mngon par phyogs par bya zhing / chu des bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya'o// 'jug pa'i dus su slob ma rdo rje sems ma
49b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya bcing ba'am/ 'ching du gzhug go// dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i bum pa la yang / so so rang rang gi mtshan mas mtshan la/ de rnams kyi rang rang gi sngags brgya rtsa brgyadad yongs bzlas la/ dkyil 'khor
49b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi phyi rol gyi mtshams su gzhag par bya'o// de rnams kyi yang phyi rol tu ni bum pa gang ba'o// ma rnyed par gyur na bcu las nyung bar mi bya'o// zhes gsungs/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bum
49b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / bum pa gang ba yang dbul bar bya ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rin po che dang / chos dang / las kyi rdo rjes mtshan la/ rang gi rigs kyi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas pa'i bum pa bzhi dang / bum pa gang ba
50a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi dbul bar bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad mngon sum lta bur bsams la/ me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de/ phyag bzhi la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas/ sdom bya bzung la/ rdo
50a2(rgyud 'grel): sems ma ji lta ba bzhin du bcings la 'jug par bya'o// de nas rdo rje chu ji lta bar 'thungs la/ bdag nyid la dbab par bya ste/ g.yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis lag pa g.yas pa'i sems ma rdo rje ma'i gung mo yang du dral zhing
50a3(rgyud 'grel): a zhes bya bas ji lta ba bzhin du brtan par byas la/ dbab pa nas/ de nyid kyi ni rdo rje gzung // chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya// dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya tshor// byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla// zhes bya ba'i bar gyi cho ga sngar
50a4(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa rnams byas la/ 'og nas bshad po'i tshig su bcad pa lngas rje su gnang ba dang gzengs bstod pa dang / lung bston pa dang / dpalnga rdo rje sems dpa'i sngags kyang blang bar bya'o// de nas bdag la byin gyis brlab pA la sogs
50a5(rgyud 'grel): pa byas nas/ bdag rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa ming gang yang rung ba brjod la/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te/ de'i gnas su badz+ra d+hA tu a zhes pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i bdag nyid
50a6(rgyud 'grel): du phob la/ badz+ro haM zhes brjod do// de nas badz+ra d+hA tu ra haM byas pas rdo rje dbyingasu bsgom par bya'o// de bzhin du rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la/ de'i gnas su badz+ra a be sha a zhes bya bas/ rdo rje dril bu bdag
50b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid pab ste/ badz+ra g+ha Na To haM/ de nas badz+ra A be shA hUM zhes bya bas dril bu der bsgom par bya ste/ de ltar na rdo rjes bsgrubs par 'gyuraro// / rdo rje slob dpon sems dpa' rdo rje lcags kyu bcings nas ni// se gol mang po brdab bgyis
50b2(rgyud 'grel): la/ sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bgyi// oM badz+ra sa ma ya dza dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes brjod do// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi// phyag rgya chen po bsgom byed cing // mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni// lan cig rab tu brjod par bgyi// de bzhin
50b3(rgyud 'grel): du rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas/ dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas la/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bskrad pa dang / ra ba dang dra ba byas te/ dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur gyis dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bcad la// yi
50b4(rgyud 'grel): ge gnyis kyi gau chus bsrungs pas thams cad yang dag par bsrung nas/ mchod yon phul la sngon du 'gro ba'i dam tshig gis phyag rgya rnams kyis blta bu byas la/ dzaHhUM baM hoHsa ma yai s+t+waM sa ma ya s+t+waM a haM zhes brjod par bya zhing /
50b5(rgyud 'grel): rang rang gi snying po dang sngags kyis kyang mthar yang dag par bskul la/ chos dang las ngang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis kyang rgyu so btab ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa nas/ bskal pa bzang po'i mthar thug pa'i byar du
50b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis kyang dbang bskur bar bya'o// de la rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'i rang gi snying po nyid chos kyi phyag rgya yin no// rdo rje dang / rin po che dang chos dang las ma rnams kyi las kyi dag rgya dang / rgya chen pon
51a1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i nang du chud pa'i bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin pa 'am/ yang na de rnams rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gzugs can no// g.yon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur bAkrAn+da la/ lug pa galus pa'i snaH
51a2(rgyud 'grel): bong dang mdzub mo gnyis kyi mthe'u chung nas brtsams nas phye la/ thal mo khong stong du byas pa 'di ni/ byams pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste/ 'di rnams kyi rig pa ni sngar bshad pa yin no// rig pa de dag nyid de rnams kyi
51a3(rgyud 'grel): ljags la bkod pa 'di ni de rnams kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o// yi ge a las rang gi thugs kar sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed la bris pa dang de'i rjesu mthun par/ de rnams phyag rgya chen por bcings pa ni/ de rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyuraro//
51a4(rgyud 'grel): rang gi snying kar rdo rje rtse lnga par bsams la/ bris pa dang rjesu mthun pa kho nar de rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o// rig ma de nyid kyang spyi'i yin no// / de nas mchod yon phul nas mchod par bya ste/ ras zung 'bum
51a5(rgyud 'grel): mam/ zung khri 'am/ zung stong dum/ zung brgya 'am/ zung re re 'am/ thams cad la spyir zung gcig dbul ba 'am/ bla re rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / grwa bzhir ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs gdags pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
51a6(rgyud 'grel): dang ba dan rnams kyang yi ge oM dang rdo rje sems dpa' lan bdun bzlas la dbul bar bya'o// me tog gi shing brgya 'am/ bzhi 'ami/ me tog thams cad kyang snga ma bzhin du mngon par bzlas la/ oM badz+ra s+pha ra Na khaM zhes bya bas
51b1(rgyud 'grel): dbul bar bya'o// dri rig pa bzlas pa'i dris byugs la/ dri zhim pa'i dri bzang po thams cad dang / bdug spos kyi rigs pa bzlas pa'i/ gA pur dang a ka ru dang tu rus skra dang tsan ngan la sogs pa legs par sbyar ba'i bdug pa btul ba'i
51b2(rgyud 'grel): spos snod 'bum mam/ khri 'am/ stong ngam/ brgya dbul bar bya ste/ bcu las nyung ba ni mi bya'o// mar ma'i snod 'bum mam/ khri 'am stong ngam/ brgya 'am bcu 'am/ bzhi pa snga ma bzhin du mar me'i sngags bzlas pa dang / swasti ka la sor+tha
51b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lha bshos kyi kha zas bza' ba dang / bca' ba rnam pa sna tshogs pas gang ba'i snod / 'bum mam/ khri 'am/ stong ngam/ brgya 'am/ bcu la oM kA ro mu khaM zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du bzlas te/ lha thams cad la dbul bar
51b4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// rol mo'i cha spyad stong phrag snyed la yi ge hUM rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi lag pa'i sor mo rnams kyis rol mo brdung ba lta bu'i phyag rgya rnams kyis/ rol mo bcu po 'di lta ste/ pi wang dang / gling bu dang / rnga dang / cang te'u dang / cha lang dang /
51b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo bo che dang / rdza Ta dang / rnga rings dang / guny+dza dang / ti mi li dang / brdung ba'i tshul du byed pas dbul bar bya'o// phyi rol tu gar mkhan dang / rol mo pa dang / cod pan dang / gdu bu dang / rna rgyan la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyang /
51b6(rgyud 'grel): oM dang hUM dang mngon par bzlas la dbul bar bya'o// de bzhin du dar dpyangs sbyangs par bya ba dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / rnga yab kyis brgyan cing / dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas sbas pa/ zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes par byas pa/ rta dang glang
52a1(rgyud 'grel): po che dang / ba lang gi khyu shin tu brtags pa rnams kyang dbul bar bya'o// rta babs yid du 'ong ba'i dril bu la sogs pa dang bcas pa yang dbul bar bya'o// de nas sgeg mo la sogs pas kyang yang dag par mchod la/ dngos grub
52a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad grub pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzod cig ces de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya'o// // de nas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog dkyil 'khor du bzhag la phyi rol du gtor ma sbyin
52a3(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ 'bras yos bcas shing til dang bcas// 'bras chen me tog chu dang bcas// sran chan bcas shing mang du bya// snum khur la sogs bza' ba rnams// ces bya ba'i gtor ma la/ a kA ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzlas nas/
52a4(rgyud 'grel): shar phyogs nas brtsams nas/ gtor ma gsum gsum gtor bar bya zhing / dri dang spos dang / me tog dang / mchod yon rnams kyang thog ma dang tha mar dbul bar bya'o// de la dang po re zhig mAN+Dal rnams byed du gzhug byar bya'o// de nas spyan dang/
52a5(rgyud 'grel): de nas dam tshig bstan la/ mchod yon yang phul te/ dri la sogs pas legs par mchod la gtor ma phul te/ de nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o// de la sngags dang phyag rgya ni 'di rnams yin te/ shwar phyogs su kha bltos te/
52a6(rgyud 'grel): rkang pa g.yas pa brkyang ba'i tshul gyis 'dug nas/ lag pa g.yon pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bstan la/ g.yas pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya sta zur phyogs su bzhag ste g.yas pa'i mdzub mo'i lcogs kyus spyan drang ba ni/ brgya byin spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o//
52b1(rgyud 'grel): de mdzub mo lcags kyu ltar ma byas pa ni brgya byin gyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// rkang pa g.yon brkyang ba'i tshul gyis 'dug la/ spyan dang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nas de'i sngags ni/ na mo badz+ra s+ya
52b2(rgyud 'grel): tsa de shi ni shi badz+ra pA Ni rak+Sha rak+ShaM swA hA/ me'i phyogasu bltas nas/ lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo zlum por bkug ste/ gung mo'i tshogs gsum par bcugs la/ mthe bong lag mthil du bzhag po ni/ me lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// spyan
52b3(rgyud 'grel): drang ba'i phyag rgyas mthe bong gi ngos la mdzub mo btsugs pa ni/ me'i lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo mthe bong ngos la btsugs te/ phyir drag tu brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o// 'di'i sngags ni/ ag+ni
52b4(rgyud 'grel): e h+ye ka pi la/ a ka pi la/ dz+wa la dz+wa la da ha shi khi tong rU prAk+Sha swA hA/ gshin rje'i phyogs su bltas nas snyim pa bdun du bzhag ste/ sor mo phan tshun bsnol la khu tshur bcings nas/ srin la gau gnyis bsgreng ste/ geshibs la
52b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yabs te/ de nang du bzhag pa ni/ gshin rje spyan 'dren pa'i phyag rgya'o// srin lag gnyis yang phyi rol tu de bzhin du gshibs te bsgreng la snying gar bzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las srin lag sbyar ba ni slar
52b6(rgyud 'grel): btang ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags ni/ ya ma ye swA hA/ bden bral gyi phyogasu bltas te/ rkang pa mnyam par 'dug la/ lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa la/ mdzub mo dang gung mo ral gri 'dra bar gshibs te bsgong la bzhag/
53a1(rgyud 'grel): // lag pa g.yon pa yang de ltar byas te ste zur logasu bzhag la/ g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug ste/ g.yab pa ni bden pal spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgyu de nyid las g.yon pa sta zur lo ga sural gri 'dra bar bzhag pa ni/ 2
53a2(rgyud 'grel): bral gyi dam tshig phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags ni/ sar+b+ba b+hu ta b+ha yaM ka re ku ru ku ru swA hA/ chu lha'i phyogs su rkang pa mnyam par 'dug la/ lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs nas/
53a3(rgyud 'grel): mthe bong dang mdzub mo gnyis gcig tu sbyar te/ zhags mig ltar byas la/ g.yon pa'i khu tshur yang de ltar byas te/ snying gar bzhag la/ g.yas pa'i mdzub mos lcags kyus g.yabs pa ni/ chu lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid
53a4(rgyud 'grel): las g.yon pa'i mdzub mo khu tshur gyi tshul du bzhag pa las/ zhags mig ltar byas pa ni chu lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags ni/ tri tri pu sha/ tri tri shi gi to la
53a5(rgyud 'grel): shu rU prAk+Sha swA hA/ rlung lha'i phyogasu bltas te 'dug la lag pu g.yon pa khu tshur bcings te/ gung mo bsgreng ba'i tshogs drang por/ mdzub mo bkug pa'i thar to gtsugs la/ lag pa g.yas kyang de bzhin du bya ste/ sta zur log su bzhag
53a6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ mthe bong bskul ba ni// rlung lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mthe bong snga ma bzhin du bzhig pa ni rlung lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bong brkyang ba ni/ slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags ni/
53b1(rgyud 'grel): oM swa sa khA khA khu kha swA hA/ ku be ra la mngon du bltas te 'dug nas/ lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar la/ rdo rje bcing ba nang du bzlog ste/ mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs la brkyang / de'i rgyab tu srin lag gnyis so sor bzhag nas/ gung mo gnyis
53b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ltar bkug ste/ ga yebs pa ni/ ku be ra spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo gnyis nang du rdo rje bcing ba'i tshul du bzhag pa de ni/ ku be ra'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las/ gung mo gnyis brkyang ba ni
53b3(rgyud 'grel): slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags ni/ oM ku bai rA ya swA hA/ dbang ldan gyi phyogasu bltas te 'dug la/ lag pa gcig tu sbyar te/ thal mo sbyar ba byas la/ sprin lag dang mthe'u chung nong du bkug ste/ bsnol la gung mo gnyis gau shibs
53b4(rgyud 'grel): te bsgreng ba'i rgyo ba logasu mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje 'dra bar bya'o// mthe bong gnyis rab tu gshibs te bzhag la/ de nyid los mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun rtse mo spyang nas nang du g.yab pa ni/ dbang ldan gyi spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid
53b5(rgyud 'grel): las snga ma bzhin du mdzubo mo rdo rje'i tshul du bzhag pa ni/ dbang ldan gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags ni/ dzum dzum shi ba swA hA/ steng gi phyogasu bltas te
53b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dug la// g.yon rkyong ba'i gnas pas 'dug la thal mo kha steng du sgyur te bzhog la/ steng du bltas te mdzub mo gnyis kyi lpags kyu ni/ tshangs pa la sogs pa spyan drang bar bya'o// de nyid mdzub mo gnyis snga ma ltar banas
54a1(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni/ slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags 'di yin te/ oM ur d+ha brah+ma Ne swAhA/ sUr+ya ya gra ha a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ tsan+d+rA ya nak+Sha tra ya a b+hA
54a2(rgyud 'grel): pa ta ye swA hA/ rkang pa gnyis mnyam par gnas pas 'dug la/ log pa gnyis gcig tu sbyor te/ sor mo rnams bar mtshams med par rtse mo phan tshun sbyar te/ mthe bong zlum por byas la/ 'og gi phyogasu bltas taM/ sa'i lha mo la sogs
54a3(rgyud 'grel): ba mdzub mo'i lcags kyus spyan drang ba ni/ 'og gi lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya 5/ snga ma bzhin du mdzub mo bzhag pa ni/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// mdzub mo gnyis btang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags ni/ adz+dzaH
54a4(rgyud 'grel): hrI de byA swA hA/ a su re b+h+yaHswAhA/ ts+tsha ge b+h+yaHswA hA/ de nas rang gi sngags de nyid kyis thams cad la 'thor 'thung phul la/ bdag dang slob ma'i tshogs su bcas pa la bgegs med par mdzod cig/ las kyi dngos grub kyang bdag la gsol cig/
54a5(rgyud 'grel): ces brjod la thams cad slar gtong ngo // yang na dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las byung ba'i tshigasu bcad pa rnams kyis gtor ma dbul bar bya ste/ lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul// na mkha' lding dang 'dab bzangs lus srul po//
54a6(rgyud 'grel): dri za srin po gdon gyi rigs rnams dang // gang dag sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can// bu smad tshogs bcas g.yogs 'khor bcas rnams la// bdag gi pus mo so la btsugs nas su// thal mo sbyar te khyod la gsol 'debs
54b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis// gsan nas phan gdags phyir ni 'dir spyon cig/ 'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang // dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi gnas rnams dang // shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim rnams dang // ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang // chu
